aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am Victor Manuel, a web developer specializing in creating functional and attractive digital solutions, based in the Principality of Asturias. My focus is on full-stack web development, interface design, and user experience optimization, skills that I apply in projects where I use modern technologies such as Astro, React, and Java, among others. Currently, I develop and manage personal projects to constantly improve my technical skills and ensure the highest quality at every stage of the process. I have a driver's license and my own vehicle, which allows me to travel without inconvenience to collaborate on projects that require local presence or assistance in different locations.
